pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data for Wordpiece-Style Tokenization // Provides data to be used by the wordpiece algorithm in order to tokenize text into somewhat meaningful chunks. Included vocabularies were retrieved from https://huggingface.co/bert-base- cased/resolve/main/vocab.txt and https://huggingface.co/bert- base-uncased/resolve/main/vocab.txt and parsed into an R-friendly format.
